title: To Hell With Being a Hero! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mystery   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Aliens   Angels   Demons   Exorcism   Eye Powers   Game Elements   Ghosts   Goddesses   Handsome Male Lead   Heroes   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Multiple Realms   Multiple Transported Individuals   Spirits   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Ro Yu-jin   로유진
description:
I lived like any ordinary person when a stranger suddenly approached me, “You are… a hero.”

“No, I’m not.”

“I see. You are the one we have been waiting for…”

I just told you I wasn’t though.

“How surprising. Were you aiming for this perhaps? As expected…”

This is crazy, absolutely mad.

“Praise the light!”

I am about to go insane, for real!>
